dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Wenstrup introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for a five-year extension to the homeless veterans reintegration programs and to provide clarification regarding eligibility for services under such programs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Homeless Veterans’ Reintegration Programs Reauthorization Act of 2015.

section.header: Five-year extension of homeless veterans reintegration programs
section.text: Section 2021(e)(F) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking 2015 and inserting 2020.

section.header: Clarification of eligibility for services under homeless veterans reintegration programs
section.text: Subsection (a) of section 2021 of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking reintegration of homeless veterans into the labor force. and inserting the following: reintegration into the labor force of—

paragraph.text: veterans participating in the Department of Veterans Affairs supported housing program for which rental assistance provided pursuant to section 8(o)(19) of the United States Housing Act of 1937 (42 U.S.C. 1437f(o)(19)); and
veterans who are transitioning from being incarcerated.
